sentences.en: At its worst, the fog of war can involve a disengagement from reality.
sentences.cn: 最糟糕的时候, 战争阴霾会产生脱离现实的幻觉.

sentences.en: During disengagement of the clutch the fingers are moved forward by the release bearing.
sentences.cn: 在离合器分散时,指针再分离轴承的作用下向前运动.

sentences.en: Facing all kinds of pains, man wants to seek the way of disengagement.
sentences.cn: 面对人世间的种种痛苦, 人要为自己寻求解脱的方式.

sentences.en: It was in effect to offer a variant to the Israeli disengagement proposal of 1971.
sentences.cn: 这实际上是以色列1971年曾经提过的脱离接触方案的翻版.

sentences.en: Should from urge close urge kind, the disengagement in the management of simple type comes out.
sentences.cn: 要从催收催种 、 简单粗放式的治理中解脱出来.

sentences.en: The strategies of relationship disengagement are simpler and easier than in physical reality.
sentences.cn: 关系解体的方式比物理现实中简单和轻易.

sentences.en: The suicide is kind of disengagement, right?
sentences.cn: 自杀是种解脱, 对 吗 ?

sentences.en: This policy of disengagement from the European war had its critics.
sentences.cn: 从欧战中逐渐撤军的政策遭到了批评。

trans.tran_cn: 脱离，解开，解脱，解除婚约
trans.tran_en: Disengagement is a process by which people gradually stop being involved in a conflict, activity, or organization
